message: Greetings! How can I help you with your admission process?
Rishit
Nice to meet you, Rishit!
MTech
Great! MTech is a fantastic choice!
Course Duration
The course duration of MBA is 2 Years, BTech is of 4 Years and MTech is of 2 Years.
Procedure
The admission procedure involves submitting an online application, and providing necessary documents. Check the college website for detailed steps.
Requirements
The admission requirements include high school transcripts, letters of recommendation, a personal statement, and standardized test scores of JEE MAINS Examination
Admissions
I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand that. Could you please rephrase or ask about admission procedures, requirements, deadlines, placements or campus?
Campus Size
The college campus size is around 170 acres and is filled with lush green parks and modern infrasturcture.
Deadline
The application deadlines vary by program. Generally, the deadlines are around August 15th for early admission and September 15th for regular admission.
Available Courses
Our college offers MBA, BTech Programs and MTech Programs.
Take care! Don't hesitate to ask if you have more questions.
